name: Merge Conflict
description:
How to Play

Each player has to collect three geometric shapes in the specified colors. 

To merge them you have to pick matching fragments and send them to the center of the screen by pressing the according key on your keyboard. 

A merged shape will always be assigned to the player who placed the first fragment.

You got 20 seconds!

Controls

Player 1: WASD

Player 2: Arrow keys

Team

Peter Mentz (Music & SFX)

Robert Ruchay (Code)

Sven Schäfer (Code)

Lena Voß (Art)

This game was made during Global Game Jam 2020 in Bayreuth. The theme was "repair". We were especially inspired by the diversifier " GGJ20 - Your Game takes exactly 20 seconds to play."
